fields.Title of Presentation: Know, Do, Become: Promoting information literacy using working professionals testaments
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: 40th Annual Conference on the First Year Experience
fields.Description/Abstract: When faculty ask librarians to provide classroom instruction it is often when students need resources for a specific assignment in the near future.  Many times those assignments involve writing a formal paper, using academic materials, and in an academic setting.  But what happens once students graduate and enter the “real world?”  What happens when students start to ask, “How does this library ‘stuff’ help me outside of school?” This presentation discusses the evolution of an embedded online information literacy microcourse used in a university first-year experience (FYE) course and its connection to career readiness.
